special_powers.name: ZOMBIE HORDE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, for all characters with this trait, choose one: MOVE -or- CLOSE. Actions of the chosen type made by friendly characters with the Zombie Horde keyword don't count against your action total this turn.

special_powers.name: IT'S ALIIIIIIVE!!!!
special_powers.description: Support as FREE, but only to target characters with the monster keyword. When Dr. Frankenstein uses it, increase the d6 result by 1.

special_powers.name: MAD SCIENTIST
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to target characters with the monster keyword. If his target is named Frankenstein's Monster, Dr. Frankenstein can modify a combat value by +2 or -2 instead.

special_powers.name: SKELETON ARMY
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Adjacent friendly characters with the Skeleton Army keyword modify damage +1.

special_powers.name: DEMON LEGION
special_powers.description: POWER: Deal Demon 1 unavoidable damage then heal an adjacent character with the Demon Legion keyword 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: THE POWER OF HELL
special_powers.description: Running Shot, Willpower; but only if a friendly character named Belphegor is within 8 squares.

special_powers.name: LYCANTHROPE: HALF-MAN, HALF-WOLF, HALF-FRENZIED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 for all characters with a Lycanthrope trait. 1-3: Turn Werewolf to a red click of the same number. 4-5: Turn him to a blue click of the same number. 6: Turn Werewolf to purple click #1.

special_powers.name: BLOODLUST
special_powers.description: Do not turn Werewolf's dial when the d6 is rolled for his trait. When Werewolf would clear action tokens, roll a d6. 1-4: Instead of clearing tokens, turn him to red click #1. 5-6: Only remove 1 action token. Werewolf has PROTECTED: Outwit.

special_powers.name: VAMPIRIC HUNGER
special_powers.description: Vampire starts the game on click #3. Steal Energy. When he uses it, he may heal past his starting line.

special_powers.name: HARBINGER OF DEATH
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from an attack made by a character with the Monster keyword, after resolutions, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage. If that character is not KO'd, immediately heal it 1 click.

special_powers.name: GIANT SCYTHE
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Giant Reach: 2.

special_powers.name: ZOMBIE HORDE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, for all characters with this trait, choose one: MOVE -or- CLOSE. Actions of the chosen type made by friendly characters with the Zombie Horde keyword don't count against your action total this turn.

special_powers.name: TALLEST OF THE HORDE
special_powers.description: Charge, Sidestep. When Zombie Abraham Lincoln hits with a close attack this turn, other friendly characters with the Zombie Horde keyword can use "FREE: Make a close attack targeting a character hit by Zombie Abraham Lincoln this turn."

special_powers.name: LEADER OF ZOMBIES
special_powers.description: If Zombie Abraham Lincoln is adjacent to a friendly character with the Zombie Horde keyword, modify attack +1. If he is adjacent to 3 or more friendly characters with the Zombie Horde keyword, also modify damage +1.

special_powers.name: FOUR SCORE AND SEVEN YEARS AGO
special_powers.description: Once per attack, when a friendly character's attack roll result is 4 or 7, choose: after resolutions, remove an action token from the attacker -or- after resolutions, give the target an action token.

special_powers.name: GHOSTLY FORM
special_powers.description: Can only carry other characters with the Ghost Realm keyword, regardless of their speed symbols.

special_powers.name: GHASTLY CHILL
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character that Ghost moved through this turn. UNIQUE MODIFIER - The chosen character modifies its attack -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ZOMBIE HORDE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, for all characters with this trait, choose one: MOVE -or- CLOSE. Actions of the chosen type made by friendly characters with the Zombie Horde keyword don't count against your action total this turn.

special_powers.name: ...AND MR. HYDE
special_powers.description: If Dr. Jekyll is on his red click numbers, POWER: Turn him to blue click #1 and give him three Potion tokens. At the beginning of your turn, remove a Potion token. When he has no Potion tokens, turn him to a red click of the same number.

special_powers.name: PEAK HUMAN CONDITION
special_powers.description: Toughness, Willpower.

special_powers.name: BRILLIANT INSIGHTS
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex.

special_powers.name: SKELETON ARMY
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Adjacent friendly characters with the Skeleton Army keyword modify damage +1.

special_powers.name: DEMON LEGION
special_powers.description: POWER: Deal Belphegor 1 unavoidable damage then heal an adjacent character with the Demon Legion keyword 2 clicks

special_powers.name: THEY ALL LIVE TO SERVE ME
special_powers.description: POWER: Generate a RIP #004 Demon on click #2. If no friendly character named Demon is on the map, generate two of them instead.

special_powers.name: FASTER, MY MINIONS!
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may roll a d6. 4-5: Remove an action token from each adjacent friendly character with the Demon Legion keyword. 6: Remove an action token from all friendly characters with the Demon Legion keyword and those characters can use Sidestep this turn.

special_powers.name: LYCANTHROPE: TWO-LEGS, FOUR-LEGS, FRENZIED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 for all characters with a Lycanthrope trait. 1-3: Turn Werewolf to a red click of the same number. 4-5: Turn him to a blue click of the same number. 6: Turn Werewolf to purple click #1.

special_powers.name: CLAWS AND TEETH
special_powers.description: When Werewolf Alpha makes a close attack, he deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BLOODLUST
special_powers.description: Do not turn Werewolf Alpha's dial when the d6 is rolled for his trait. When Werewolf Alpha would clear action tokens, roll a d6. 1-4: Instead of clearing tokens, turn him to red click #1. 5-6: Only remove 1 action token. Werewolf Alpha has PROTECTED: Outwit.

special_powers.name: MIST-FORM OR BAT-FORM?
special_powers.description: FREE: Turn Vampire Baron to a click of the same number but a different color.

special_powers.name: THE WHISPER ON THE WIND
special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Characters.

special_powers.name: THE SHADOW IN THE NIGHT
special_powers.description: Tiny Symbol.

special_powers.name: HARBINGER OF DEATH
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from an attack made by a character with the Monster keyword, after resolutions, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage. If that character is not KO'd, immediately heal it 1 click.

special_powers.name: GIANT SCYTHE
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Giant Reach: 2.

special_powers.name: GHOSTLY FORM
special_powers.description: Can only carry other characters with the Ghost Realm keyword, regardless of their speed symbols.

special_powers.name: GHASTLY CHILL
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character that Jacob Marley moved through this turn. UNIQUE MODIFIER - The chosen character modifies its attack -2 until your next turn. After resolutions, you and the opposing character's owner each roll 2d6. If your result is higher, deal that character 1 penetrating damage and heal Jacob Marley 1 click.

special_powers.name: GHOSTLY FORM
special_powers.description: Can only carry other characters with the Ghost Realm keyword, regardless of their speed symbols.

special_powers.name: GHASTLY CHILL
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character that Ghost of Abraham Lincoln moved through this turn. UNIQUE MODIFIER - The chosen character modifies its attack -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: GETTYSBURG ADDRESS
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Ghost of Abraham Lincoln uses it as CLOSE, he targets all opposing characters within 4 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: FOUR SCORE AND SEVEN YEARS AGO
special_powers.description: Once per attack, when a friendly character's attack roll result is 4 or 7, choose: after resolutions, remove an action token from the attacker -or- after resolutions, give the target an action token.

special_powers.name: RRRRRGHH!
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn roll a d6. 4-6: Frankenstein's Monster may immediately make a close attack.

special_powers.name: MY CREATOR
special_powers.description: Friendly characters with the Scientist keyword can use Support to target Frankenstein's Monster. When a character with the Scientist keyword targets Frankenstein's Monster with Support, his defense value is 14 for that action. If that character is named Dr. Frankenstein, he can use Support even if he or Frankenstein's Monster are adjacent to an opposing character.
